title: Dancer

adjectives: Delighting the senses or exciting intellectual or emotional admiration
Delighting the senses or exciting intellectual or emotional admiration.
Of, relating to, or denoting the sex which is generally characterized as the one associated with the larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces fertilizable gametes (ova) from which offspring develop
Belonging to the sex with larger, fertilizable gametes.

Belonging to the sex which typically produces eggs, which in humans and most other mammals is typically the one which has XX chromosomes; belonging to the sex which has larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).
Inspiring awe or admiration or wonder- Melville
Causing astonishment in; causing to be astonished.
Pleasing by delicacy or grace; not imposing
Festive and full of fun and laughter
Festive and full of fun and laughter.
Giving fun, gaiety, joy, and cheerful spirit.
verbs: Have or participate in a party
Move in a graceful and rhythmical way
To move with rhythmic steps or movements, especially in time to music.
nouns: A woman is a female human.
Female adult human
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female human.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
Adult female human being.
Taking a series of rhythmical steps (and movements) in time to music
The activity of taking part in a dance.
Creative work whose interpretation generally involves movement of the body
Movements to music.
A sequence of rhythmic steps or movements performed to music, for pleasure or as a form of social interaction.
A sequence of rhythmic steps or movements usually performed to music, for pleasure or as a form of social interaction.
Dance generally refers to human movement either used as a form of expression or presented in a social, spiritual or performance setting.
The activity of making rhythmic movements to music.
Dance is the art of movement of the body, usually rhythmically and to music, using prescribed or improvised steps and gestures.
Young female human
A young female human; (in contrast to boy), a female child or young adult.
A title of respect for a young woman (usually unmarried) with or without a name used.
A young female person, usually a child or teenager.
A young woman
A young girl.
A girl is any female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.
A girl is a female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.
A young female; miss.
A polite name for any woman
A one-piece garment for a woman; has skirt and bodice
Frock has been used since Middle English as the name for an article of clothing for men and women.
A one-piece garment for a woman that has a skirt and a body section.
A dress is a garment consisting of a skirt with an attached bodice.
A skirt with an attached bodice
A performer who dances professionally
Person who dances.
A person who dances, especially professionally.
A show put on for the enjoyment or amusement of others
Activities that are enjoyable or amusing
A source of amusement, enjoyment or pleasure.
Show for enjoyment.
Playful fun
Basic emotion
Fun is a word for activity which produces amusement, delight, or joy.
Amusement, enjoyment or pleasure
Fun is the enjoyment of pleasure, particularly in leisure activities.

description:
A person dancing, most commonly displayed as woman with one arm raised wearing a red dress, while dancing the salsa or flamenco. Often used to represent a sense of fun or as a positive affirmation, e.g. "great! ðŸ’ƒ"

This emoji did not originally specify a gender, but was canonically deemed a woman when the ðŸ•º Man Dancing emoji was approved. Google previously displayed this emoji as a man, then a gender-neutral blob character (in keeping with guidelines at the time).

Microsoft previously displayed this emoji as stick figure, and Samsung has displayed this over various releases as a white boy, black boy, and white girl.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman dancing emoji embodies pure exuberance and freedom of movement. Her silhouette is dynamically posed, arms outstretched and body in mid-motion, captured with Apple's signature smooth gradients that suggest flowing fabric and a vibrant spirit.  The realistic lighting enhances the sense of joy and spontaneity, making this emoji a delightful way to express happiness, celebration, or a carefree attitude.
